name: Air Fryer Chicken Thighs
ingredients: 4 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs, about 2 pounds
1 teaspoon EACH smoked paprika, garlic powder, oregano, cumin, salt & pepper
instructions: Preheat the air fryer to 400°F. In a small bowl, whisk the spices and set aside. To a large bowl, add the chicken thighs and drizzle with olive oil, and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Toss to coat. Transfer to the preheated air fryer and cook for 12 minutes per side or until cooked through and skin is crispy.
